channel.title: Adding Correct Specials? rep++ for help!
channel.description:
Hey, I need to add the correct special to the VLS - Vesta Long Sword.
Right now the special is: Sword in ground, Spirit leaving body.
I would like to make it the correct Vesta Long Sword Special.
Rep++ for help!
Thanks,

item.title: Adding Correct Specials? rep++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Do you have the right animations loading?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Correct Specials? rep++ for help!

item.title: Adding Correct Specials? rep++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Okay, I just looked in my client.java and searched the item id for the VLS.

These are the two codes I got:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9802 && specialAmount > 24){ setAnimation(293); usingSpecial = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; specialAmount -= 25; getHit(5); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+10); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); getHit(10); specOn = false; }
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9802 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(false, 25, 293, 3157); npcDamage(8); }

Should I have both of these codes in my client.java?

If so, what do I change to make the correct VLS special attack?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Correct Specials? rep++ for help!
